Soul_Tentacles.help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows the souls of the damned to slip into our reality. These Soul Tentacles will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while they drain their life. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Soul_Tentacles.targetHelp: The Soul Tentacles are immobilizing you.

Midnight_Grasp.help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe, reduce their chance to hit and continuously drain their life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Midnight_Grasp.shortHelp: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Midnight_Grasp.targetHelp: The dark tentacles of the Midnight Grasp are holding you immobile. Your chance to hit is reduced.

Soul_Storm.help: Like Ghost Widow, you can summon the souls of your victims to do your bidding. Soul Storm enraptures a single target Holding them while their life-force is drained from their body. You must be level 41 and have one other Soul Mastery power before selecting this power. Recharge: Slow
Soul_Storm.targetHelp: You are being Held by a Soul Storm. You are taking negative Damage over time as your life is drained.

Darkest_Night.help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and chance to hit of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. You must be level 41 and have one other Soul Mastery power before selecting this power. Recharge: Moderate
Darkest_Night.targetHelp: Your chance to hit and Damage potential are reduced by the darkness.
Darkest_Night.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest} and all foes nearby.
Darkest_Night.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage and chance to hit with their {PowerName}.

Summon_Mistress.help: Ghost Widow has assigned a Fortunata Mistress for you to command. Arguably, the most powerful of the Fortunatas, these rare few have mastered numerous psychic abilities and risen to the top of Lord Recluse's beautiful Black Widows. Your access to this Fortunata is very limited. You can only summon her once every 15 minutes and she will leave after 4 minutes, or if you exit a zone or mission. You must be level 44 and have two other Soul Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Recharge: Extremely Long
Summon_Mistress.shortHelp: Summon Fortunata Mistress: Ranged Moderate DMG(Psionic)
